flawed_nl_solution:
On Wednesday, Liza had $800 - $450 = $<<800-450=530>>530 left in her account.
After depositing on Thursday, she had $530 + $1500 = $<<530+1500=2030>>2030 in her account.
On Friday, she paid a total of $117 + $100 = $<<117+100=217>>217 for her electricity and internet bills.
So, $2030 - $217 = $<<2030-217=1813>>1813 was left on her account on Friday.
After paying her phone bill, Liza has $1813 - $70 = $<<1813-70=1743>>1743 left in her account.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 350, not 530. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
